Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-7256 affecting package libpcap for versions less than 1.10.1-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-7256 affecting package libpcap for versions less than 1.10.1-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libpcap is earlier than 1.10.1-4, affected by CVE-2023-7256
